name: Agrupacion Española de Fabricantes de Conservas Vegetales
membership: AGRUCON es socio de la FIAB (Federación Española de Industrias de Alimentación y Bebidas), TomatoEurope(Processors Association), AMITOM (Association Meditarraneenne Internationale de la Tomate) y el WPTC (World Processing Tomato Council)
memberOrga:
Los socios de AGRUCON son empresas españolas transformadoras de tomate:
AGRAZ, ALGOSUR, ALSAT, CONESA, CONSERVAS CIDACOS, IAN, INPRALSA, NESTLE ESPAÑA, TOMATES DEL SUR
goal: Agrupar a las empresas fabricantes de conservas vegetales y representar, promover y defender sus intereses colectivos
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives: Common Agricultural Policy (CAP), Climate Change (Emmissions Trading Scheme, ETS), Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership (TTIP), Brexit
